entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:45 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -10.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:44 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:44 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:44 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
